title: Scripted Font
content:
Hi there,

Can anybody ID this font?

J

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205123im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_4563.jpg)
author: walkie_talker

comments.content:
Thirsty Script: [http://www.myfonts.com/search/thirsty/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205123/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/thirsty/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/thirsty/")  
Depending on the means of printing, it may be the "Rough" or the "Soft" style: [http://speckyboy.com/2014/05/08/thirsty-soft-font-family-9/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205123/http:/speckyboy.com/2014/05/08/thirsty-soft-font-family-9/ "http://speckyboy.com/2014/05/08/thirsty-soft-font-family-9/")
